data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Approval Of Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30 2025.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 & Regulation 33 read with Schedule III of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. Wednesday November 12 2025 has inter alia considered and approved the Un-audited (Standalone & Consolidated) Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that CRISIL rating Limited (CRISIL) vide its letter date November 11 2025 has revised the Credit rating of Andhra Pradesh Granite (Midwest) Private Limited Subsidiary Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body:
Earnings Conference Call is scheduled on Thursday November 13 2025 at 03:00 P.M (IST). 

Please find enclosed herewith the Invitation for Conference Call to discuss the financial performance of the Company for the quarter and half year ended on September 30 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Consideration And Approval Of The Un-Audited (Standalone And Consolidated) Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30 2025.
data.news_body: Midwest Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 12/11/2025 inter alia to consider and approve the Un-Audited (Standalone and Consolidated) Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30 2025.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30(5) Of The SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: Intimation under Regulation 30(5) of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: The trading window for dealing in securities of the Company is closed for all designated persons and their immediate relatives on and from October 24 2025 till 48 hours after the declaration of Un-audited (Standalone & Consolidated) Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended on September 30 2025.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Midwest Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from October 24 2025 the Equity Shares of Midwest Ltd (Scrip Code: 544587) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251023- dated October 23 2025.
